actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend section 1341 (b) (2) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to clarify the computation of tax where taxpayer restores substantial amount held under claim of right.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide that refunds or repayments with respect to regulated oil prices shall be subject to the rules for computing the tax where a taxpayer restores a substantial amount held under claim of right.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 1341 (b) (2) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to clarify the computation of tax where taxpayer restores substantial amount held under claim of right.
